description:
Story

The world was full of peace, right up until the very end...
Then the doors of hell swung open and chaos swallowed all living things, transforming them into Demons!
Become the Hunter and push back the forces of madness!

Gameplay

You'll need to collect hearts and unleash the power of subweapons
in order to clear all stages in this challenging action game!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switchâ„¢.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series HUNTER OF DEVIL
